description: Singi-X Anorak is a lightweight, wind-resistant jacket made from a high-density cotton weave that makes a perfect shell layer for outdoor activities in the winter. The fabric is water repellent, wind resistant and well ventilated and can be waxed for extra protection and durability. The anorak has a generous cut with zippers in the side and brass buttons. Adjustable hood with mouldable brim, two hand pockets and a large kangaroo pocket with inside pocket.
name: Fjallraven Singi X-Anorak - Mens
